member.name: T:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService
member.summary: Thread-safe, in-memory service that manages client-to-endpoint session pinning for sticky session support on Virtual Model Runners. Implements IDisposable to clean up the background cleanup timer.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.#ctor(SyslogLogging.LoggingModule)
member.summary: Instantiate the session affinity service. Starts a background cleanup timer that removes expired entries every 60 seconds.
member.param: Logging module. Must not be null.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.TryGetPinnedEndpoint(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempt to retrieve the pinned endpoint for a client. Returns false if no pin exists or the entry has expired. Refreshes LastAccessUtc on hit.
member.param: Virtual model runner ID. Returns false if null or empty.
Client identity key. Returns false if null or empty.
The pinned endpoint ID if found.
member.returns: True if a valid, non-expired pin was found; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.SetPinnedEndpoint(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create or update a session pin for a client to a specific endpoint. If maxEntries is exceeded for the VMR, evicts the oldest entries by LastAccessUtc.
member.param: Maximum session entries for this VMR.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.RemovePinnedEndpoint(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Explicitly remove a session pin for a client. Does not throw if the entry does not exist.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.RemoveAllForVmr(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all session entries for a specific VMR. Useful when VMR configuration changes.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.RemoveAllForEndpoint(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all entries pinned to a specific endpoint across all VMRs. Useful when an endpoint is deactivated or deleted.
member.param: Endpoint ID to remove pins for.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.GetSessionCount(System.String)
member.summary: Get the number of active (non-expired) sessions for a VMR.
member.returns: Count of active sessions. Returns 0 if VMR has no sessions.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.Cleanup
member.summary: Remove all expired entries across all VMRs. Called periodically by the background cleanup timer.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of managed resources including the cleanup timer.

member.name: M:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True if called from Dispose(), false if called from finalizer.

member.name: T:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.SessionEntry
member.summary: Represents a single session pin entry mapping a client to an endpoint. Thread safety: individual field mutations are protected by the Lock object.

member.name: F:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.SessionEntry.CreatedUtc
member.summary: When the pin was first established.

member.name: F:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.SessionEntry.LastAccessUtc
member.summary: Refreshed on each use. Entries expire after TimeoutMs of inactivity.

member.name: P:Conductor.Server.Services.SessionAffinityService.SessionEntry.IsExpired
member.summary: Whether this entry has expired based on LastAccessUtc and TimeoutMs.
